parameters.name: competitor_price
parameters.desc: Competitor's reported price for price-match rules

parameters.name: booking_window_days
parameters.desc: Days between booking date and travel date (lead time)

parameters.name: advance_purchase_hours
parameters.desc: Hours before travel when booked (useful for last-minute rules)

parameters.name: trip_length_days
parameters.desc: Total number of days for the trip

parameters.name: max_stay_days
parameters.desc: Maximum nights for the rule applicability

parameters.name: supplier
parameters.desc: Supplier id or name (for supplier-specific rules)

parameters.name: is_refundable
parameters.desc: Whether the booking fare is refundable

parameters.name: promo_code
parameters.desc: Promo or coupon code used by customer

parameters.name: promo_eligible
parameters.desc: Flag if customer is eligible for promotions (precomputed)

parameters.name: min_booking_amount
parameters.desc: Minimum cart value to apply rule

parameters.name: max_discount_pct
parameters.desc: Maximum allowed discount percent for the rule (validation)

parameters.name: match_price_proof
parameters.desc: Proof link or reference for price-match claims

parameters.name: fare_basis
parameters.desc: Airline fare-basis code or fare family

parameters.name: stopovers
parameters.desc: Number of stopovers for a flight itinerary

parameters.name: room_type
parameters.desc: Room type or category for hotels

parameters.name: pickup_location
parameters.desc: Pickup location for transfers / car hires

parameters.name: dropoff_location
parameters.desc: Dropoff location for transfers / car hires
